item_desc4JP.	\t\tŠÈ‘f‚ÈÆ–¾Ší‹ïBí‚ÉüˆÍ‚ğ–¾‚é‚­Æ‚ç‚·B\n#`ŠÓ’è•ñ‘Fƒ—p‹ï„ƒJƒeƒSƒŠ`\n
item_desc1EN.	\t\tAn iron basket holding a flame, at the end of a post, for simple illumination. Its rustic design gives off a somewhat wild impression. Many shops and restaurants have installed these for that effect in recent years.\n#~Today You're an Adventurer - Travel Manual~\n
item_desc2EN.	
item_desc3EN.	
item_desc4EN.	\t\tSimple lighting. Keeps the surroundings illuminated.
item_desc1EN.	\t\tAn iron basket holding a flame, at the end of a post, for simple illumination. Its rustic design gives off a somewhat wild impression. Many shops and restaurants have installed these for that effect in recent years.\n#~Today You're an Adventurer - Travel Manual~\n
item_desc2EN.	
item_desc3EN.	
item_desc4EN.	\t\tSimple lighting. Keeps the surroundings illuminated.
